Posts.Content: Hi, My wife was also very recently diagnosed with MpBC HER2+. Currently undergoing Neo adjuvant chemo (TCHP). Very agressive cancer, but the HER2+ is an important (positive) point. See very recent research on this question: http://www.practiceupdate.com/content/her2-positive-metaplastic-breast-cancer-impact-of-receptor-status-on-survival/63025 HER2+ MpBC tend to have a much better prognosis than "standard" triple negative MpBC.
Posts.Title: Anyone else had metaplastic HER2+ cancer?
